content: in this amigurumi tutorial we ll learn how to crochet a little octopus this pattern is **beginner friendly** and goes through all the introductory stitches and teaches you how to crochet your octopus with **no sewing needed ** *includes video tutorials for the more difficult parts of the pattern * *also includes a printable version * materials needed - worsted weight yarn - size us-g/4 00mm - needle to sew in ends - scissors - a small amount of stuffing - plastic safety bead eyes 6 - 8mm stitches used - chain chain stitch - st stitch - slip_stitch slip_stitch - single_crochet single_crochet - decrease/increase decrease/increase - invdec invisible decrease - blo back loops only
